title: Ranked Stats
body: I can't seem to find a way to see my champion ranked stats in the updated client, in legacy all i had to do was view profile but i've looked everywhere in the updated client and haven't been able to find anything

replies.body:
This feature isn't currently available in the Beta Client. The client is being updated all the time, so this feature could be right around the corner. You can keep up with updates to the Client as we post them on the [**News Page.**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/)

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Really!?  So I gather that you plan on including it at some point?  If so, this is great news for the statistician like myself!!

I don't work on the Client Update team, so I can't say for sure whether or not a feature is planned unless it has already been announced. In this case, I'd just keep a close eye on the news for any client updates or feature spotlights. ^.^
